title: Sprint 1 - Planning, Review, and Setup
description: Everyone needs a map for without a map where will you go?

main_info.paragraph: Planning: Research on the deeper subjects of Reinforcement Learning and finding ways to incorporate them into projects for the 14 iterations after this one.

Review: The fundamentals must be clear to move to a higher step in the learning process. I will be re-analyzing the math behind neural networks and understanding the key terms associated with it. Making flashcards will help memorize some key terminology that I always seem to forget. I will also be looking into my code from my past projects to refresh.

Setup: The site will be rehauled to host my past projects. Currently, my site does not have a backend and I will be using FLASK to build a simple backend to run some of my machine learning projects. To host FLASK I will be using Heroku and for the database section, I will be looking at amazon's free database service to handle the data if necessary.
